mapper.update: UPDATE home SET home_content=#{home_content}, home_owner=#{home_owner}, home_address=#{home_address}, home_longitude=#{home_longitude}, home_latitude=#{home_latitude}, home_https=#{home_https}, home_tell=#{home_tell}, home_content=#{home_content}, home_image=#{home_image} WHERE home_code=#{home_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM home JOIN admin ON home.admin_code = admin.admin_code WHERE company_code=#{company_code}
